phrase: 把美好的回忆留在心中
english: Hold your beautiful memories in your heart
spanish: Guarda tus preciosos recuerdos en tu corazón

phrase: 她说了问题的两个方面
english: He talked about both sides of the problem
spanish: Él hablo de ambos lados del problema

phrase: 以上的问题都明白了嘛？
english: Do you understand all of the above questions?
spanish: Entiendes todas las preguntas de arriba?

english: The teacher asked the students hand in their homework
spanish: La maestra le pidió a los estudiantes entregar la tarea

english: These are the job requirements
spanish: Estos son los requerimientos del trabajo

english: The content of this book is difficult
spanish: El contenido de este libro es dificíl

phrase: 今天的会议内容是什么?
english: What is today's meeting content?
spanish: Cuál es el contenido de la junta de hoy?

english: Here is one sheet of paper
spanish: Aquí esta una hoja de papel

english: There's a newspaper on the table
spanish: Hay un periodico sobre la mesa

english: The work was completed
spanish: El trabajo se completó

english: I have finished this work
spanish: Terminé este trabajo

english: These are my basic conditions
spanish: Estas son mis condiciones básicas

english: The work is basically finished
spanish: El trabajo está básicamente terminado

english: I only found out about this today
spanish: Apenas hoy me entere de esto

english: Lunch has just started
spanish: La comida apenas empezó

english: That's a bird
spanish: Esa es un ave

english: What kind of animal is it?
spanish: Qué clase de animal es?

english: I'll wait for you at the station
spanish: Te espero en la estación

english: He's standing in front of the window
spanish: Él esta parado frente a la ventana

english: This information is wrong
spanish: Esta información está mal

english: He send me a message
spanish: Él me mandó un mensaje

english: They come fron different areas
spanish: Ellos vienen de diferentes areas

english: A problem arose regarding the work
spanish: Surgió un problema con el trabajo

english: The examination is quite easy this time
spanish: El examén estuvó muy fácil esta vez

english: It's easy to catch a cold in winter
spanish: Es fácil resfriarse en invierno
